title: Drawing, "Design for Two Chairs, Checkmate Prologue", 1937
medium: Brush and gouache, graphite, pen and black ink on white paper
signed: Signed in black ink, lower right: E. Mcknight Kauffer
inscribed: Inscribed in black ink, left margin: Love's chair; right margin: Death's chair; lower right: Checkmate Prologue
creditline: Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer
description: Two chair designs, one blue and one black, with trapezoidal backs; a profile elevation of the chair at the center in graphite.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for Two Chairs, Checkmate Prologue", 1937.
1937. Brush and gouache, graphite, pen and black ink on white paper. Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer. 1963-39-284.
